title: Climbing up the mountain Creeping on my knees Seeking for my Jesus To tell about meh troubles, Trouble O, trouble O, The whole world in trouble, Trouble O, trouble O, The whole world in trouble. Children walk the road, It's a lone-some road, Children of Zion Walk the Heavenly road.
lyrics: Climbing up the mountain Creeping on my knees Seeking for my Jesus To tell about meh troubles, Trouble O, trouble O, The whole world in trouble, Trouble O, trouble O, The whole world in trouble. Children walk the road, It's a lone-some road, Children of Zion Walk the Heavenly road.
